infos.name: Room B
infos.desc:
You are in a Room B. A standard one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can see a chest.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out a box.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a display. You look at the price tag on the display. Sixty dollars?! Where'd they buy this display, some kind of expensive place?[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The display contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a shelf. [if there is something on the s_1]On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] red door leading south. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] blue door leading west.

infos.name: Room A
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room A. A normal one.

 You make out a Microsoft style locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The Microsoft style locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The Microsoft style locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can make out a Microsoft box.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The Microsoft box contains [a list of things in the c_5]. You look around you, at all the containers and supporters, doors and objects, and you think to yourself. Why? Why Textworld?[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Microsoft box is empty![end if] You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a locker.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] Hey, want to see a table? Look over there, a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] However, the table, like an empty table, has nothing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if] You can make out a stand. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a stand? [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Hm. Oh well[end if] Look over there! an armchair. You shudder, but continue examining the armchair. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the armchair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] blue door leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] white door leading south.

infos.name: Room C
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room C. A typical kind of place. The room is well lit.

 You can make out a Microsoft locker.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The Microsoft locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see a case. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The case contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out a saucepan. The saucepan is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the saucepan you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You move on, clearly upset by your TextWorld experience.[end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a platter. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the platter. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]However, the platter, like an empty platter, has nothing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] red door leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] green door leading west.

infos.name: Room D
infos.desc:
Welcome to the Room D. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You make out a refrigerator.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_0]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] [if c_10 is locked]A locked[else if c_10 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] rectangular safe is close by.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The rectangular safe contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The rectangular safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type B safe, which looks usual, here.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The type B safe contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type B safe is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] green door leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] white door leading north.
